Machine Learning and Science

Machine learning and simulation has become one of the major pillars of scientific research. Such techniques have signficantly quickened the pace at which research is conducted and will continue to change the landscape of research for decades to come.

The purpose of this blog is two fold; provide fresh content on technical aspects of machine learning and provide a way for me to chronical and summarize what I have learned. Personally, I'm able to learn much more efficiently if I learn with the intent to teach. If in reading this blog you find material that is inaccurate, in need of clarification, or have any other issues, please use the websites email interface to send me a message detailing the issue. Thanks and enjoy the blog!
